p: Other terpenes that have effective antidepressant properties include hyperforin which is present in the extracts of (Subhan et al. 2010) . It has been shown that the extracts of H. perforatum differ in their antidepressant potential with the difference in concentration of hyperforin present in the extract (Laakmann et al. 1999). Similar to many other antidepressants hyperforin acts by inhibiting the neuronal uptake of mood regulators such as serotonin, dopamine and norepinephrine. In addition, it also has its own unique mechanism of controlling depression by inhibiting the neurotransmitters GABA and l-glutamate uptake (MÃ¼ller et al. 2001).
